body_html: The backends are scattered around 4 files basing on (dim TemporalReflectionPadding, SpatialReflectionPadding) * (backend .c, .cu). If we add 3+D kernels, there will be more. So I think that this function is a good place to add. What do you think?

body: The backends are scattered around 4 files basing on (dim `TemporalReflectionPadding`, `SpatialReflectionPadding`) * (backend `.c`, `.cu`). If we add 3+D kernels, there will be more. So I think that this function is a good place to add. What do you think?
